testcase.name: Check if Admin able to retrieve all programs with valid Endpoint

testcase.name: Check if admin able to retrieve all class recording
testcase.system-out: Given Admin sets Authorization for class module.............................passed When Admin creates GET Request and sends HTTPS Request with endpoint for getAllRecordings.passed Then Admin receives 200 "OK" Status for getAllRecordings....................passed

testcase.name: Check if admin able to retrieve all class recording with invalid Endpoint
testcase.system-out: Given Admin sets Authorization for class module.............................passed When Admin creates GET Request and sends HTTPS Request with invalid endpoint for getAllRecordings.passed Then Admin receives 404 "Not Found" Status for getAllRecordings.............passed

testcase.system-out: Given Admin sets Authorization for class module.............................passed When Admin creates Other Request and sends HTTPS Request with valid endpoint for getAllRecordings.passed Then Admin receives 405 "Method Not Allowed" Status for getAllRecordings....passed

testcase.name: Check if admin able to retrieve all class recording without Authorization
testcase.system-out: Given Admin sets Authorization for class module.............................passed When Admin creates GET Request and sends HTTPS Request with valid endpoint but without Auth for getAllRecordings.passed Then Admin receives 401 "Unauthorized" Status for getAllRecordings..........passed
